#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	int t;
	scanf("%u",&t);
	
	while(t--){
		int x1,x2,y1,y2,x3,x4,y3,y4;
		scanf("%u%u%u%u",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
		scanf("%u%u%u%u",&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);
		long long int area=0;
		int x5=max(x1,x3);
		int y5=max(y1,y3);
		int x6=min(x2,x4);
		int y6=min(y2,y4);
		if(x5<x6 && y5<y6)
		area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3)-(x6-x5)*(y6-y5);
		else
		area=(x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3);
		
		printf("%u\n",area);
	}
}
